class_notes:
(Permission of Instructor Required Prior to Enrollment)


This course is for those selected to serve as Learning to Lead Facilitators.  Enrollment codes will be provided to that group during add/drop/swap in the Fall semester.
course_description: Teaching to lead to foster reflective practices by encouraging PALs to apply what they have learned to their work in facilitating Learning to Lead and reflecting on the experience.
sections: Class Nbr: 4410, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: OXF, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: V. Roman, Status: Open
